review: Easy to use and easy to set up. Using on our 2nd TV - so we can watch things on it, without having to pay for a 2nd device from cable company (we already pay them too much).  I was pleased with how easy it was to set up and use.  Netflix works like a charm, and the wi-fi connection works nicely, even though it is a few rooms away from the router.
